title: Dear Riot, what did I get banned for?
body: I just logged on to find myself banned so I checked my match history to see what I did. The last game I played was a tryndamere game where we lost so at the end I brought 6 tears (it was just me vs 5 enemy members so I could do anything) while they were taking our nexus. Other than that I don't remember doing anything wrong.

replies.body:
>I played was a tryndamere game where we lost so at the end I brought 6 tears (it was just me vs 5 enemy members so I could do anything) while they were taking our nexus.

um

Like, how "lost" was this game when you did that?
As in I have to 1v5 the enemy (literally, all my team mates died in the fight) to save the nexus.

Ah, well, if you were playing with team-mates who couldn't comprehend that it was almost impossible for you to defend for long enough for them to respawn then they might have reported you, especially if it was because of a teamfight and there was some time between when the fight ended and when they pushed.

Thing is, though, four reports won't be enough to ban you. Additionally, you're usually told what you're banned for when you are. Have you contacted Riot about this yet?
